Title: Hanes 8 Pair Low Cut Socks Mens
Description:
BUILT FOR PERFORMANCE These men's low-cut socks from the Hanes Ultimate® collection deliver the comfort and athletic style you look for. Crafted with innovative X-Temp™ technology, they are designed to adapt to your temperature for all-day comfort. Advanced odor protection technology and moisture-wicking fabric keep your feet feeling cool and fresh. The low-cut style features all-over cushioning - so you can take on the day with ease. The best part? These comfortable men's socks are available in an 8-pack for one-and-done shopping.
# Pieces In Set: 8 Pair
Features: Cuffed, Cushioned, Stretch Fabric, Reinforced Toe & Heel, Multi-Pack, Moisture Wicking, Odor Resistant
Shoe Size Range: 6-12
Fiber Content: 48% Polyester, 43% Cotton, 6% Rayon, 2% Spandex, 1% Nylon
Fabric Description: Knit

Title: J. Ferrar Slim Mens Vest
Description:
Ideal for wearing over a collared shirt or tee, this slim suit vest from J. Ferrar men's collection is tailored from a recycled stretch woven-blend that's also wrinkle-resistant. It has a button-front closure, front pockets, a satin back, and an adjustable d-ring back closure for your perfect fit. Pair it with the coordinating suit jacket and pants for a complete look.
Features: Wrinkle Resistant, Stretch Fabric, Belted
Closure Type: Button
Fit: Classic Fit
Pockets: 2 Front Slip Pockets
Sleeve Length: Sleeveless
Apparel Length: 27.5 Inches - Front
Fiber Content: 44% Polyester, 30% Recycled Polyester, 19% Rayon, 7% Spandex
Fabric Description: Woven
Lining Material: Polyester
